title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mount Taygetos, Greece
content:
Photo submitted by Panayiotis Papadopoulos, “This is a pic at 1300m at Mount Taygetos, the mountain of the Spartans. It’s a still climb where you gain 1100m in just 13km. Typically there should be more snow at the tops at this time of year. The bike is a Moustache Dimanche 29.5.” We always love seeing photos […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mount Taygetos, Greece appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
